features: 🎶【40MM DRIVER & 3 MUSIC MODES】Picun B8 bluetooth headphones are designed for audiophiles, equipped with dual 40mm dynamic sound units and 3 EQ modes, providing you with stereo high-definition sound quality while balancing bass and mid to high pitch enhancement in more detail. Simply press the EQ button twice to cycle between Pop/Bass boost/Rock modes and enjoy your music time!

🎶【120 HOURS OF MUSIC TIME】Challenge 30 days without charging! Picun headphones wireless bluetooth have a built-in 1000mAh battery can continually play more than 120 hours after one fully charge. Listening to music for 4 hours a day allows for 30 days without charging, making them perfect for travel, school, fitness, commuting, watching movies, playing games, etc., saving the trouble of finding charging cables everywhere. (Press the power button 3 times to turn on/off the low latency mode.)

🎶【COMFORTABLE & FOLDABLE】Our bluetooth headphones over the ear are made of skin friendly PU leather and highly elastic sponge, providing breathable and comfortable wear for a long time; The adjustable headband and 60° rotating earmuff design of bluetooth headset make the earmuffs more suitable for your head shape, suitable for all age groups, and the perfect gift for Back to School, Christmas, Valentine's Day, etc. There are 4 colors available for wireless headphones to meet your fashion needs.

🎶【BT 5.3 & HANDS-FREE CALLS】Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip, Picun B8 bluetooth headphones has a faster and more stable transmission range, up to 33 feet. Featuring unique touch control and built-in microphone, our wireless headphones are easy to operate and supporting hands-free calls. (Short touch once to answer, short touch three times to wake up/turn off the voice assistant, touch three seconds to reject the call.)

🎶【LIFETIME USER SUPPORT】In the box you’ll find a foldable deep bass headphone, a 3.5mm audio cable, a USB charging cable, and a user manual. Picun promises to provide a one-year refund guarantee and a two-year warranty, along with lifelong worry-free user support. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will reply within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 3EQ Modes 2 Game Mode 3 Wireless / Wired 4 Multi-Point Connection

Battery Display & Volume Synchronization When the bluetooth headset is connected to the IOS device, the current battery level of the headphones is displayed in the upper right corner of the IOS device screen. Press the "+" and "-" buttons on the headphones to synchronously adjust the phone volume. (This feature only supports IOS systems) Auto-shutdown & Auto-reconnection Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip, our Bluetooth headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth devices. When the Bluetooth headset exceeds the Bluetooth range (10m/33ft), it will disconnect. If the headphone return to Bluetooth range within 5 minutes, it will automatically reconnect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality product for low price
reviews.reviewText: These fit quite comfortably for several hours. They cancel noise about 85%, which is pretty good compared to other competitors and price range. They came 90% charged so ready to use. Easy to pair up to phone. Really like the buttons on the side. Made calls, watched videos, played some games. Great experience overall. Nothing to complain about. The packaging was compact and simple. Enjoyed the product. Give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with them, especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have been very happy with these headphones. Yeah, they don’t cancel noise quite as well as the several hundred dollar one, but they do a great job and the sound is clear. I got the Cyan ones and I love the color. They’re comfortable and the battery lasts a long time. I’ve used them several times for hours and have yet to have to charge them. I think they’d be great to buy for kids that aren’t ready for expensive electronics too- they’re pretty durable and not heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Deal at the price!
reviews.reviewText: While these are not noise-cancelling (not advertized to be either) they are GREAT bluetooth 'cans' for the price. The sound is deep, rich and not boomy or shrill. Reasonably comfortable (any headphone stuffed with a battery, receiver, etc... will never be really light) and unreasonably low priced. A great bargan.Cons? well...the control buttons are black just like the surrounding headphone making it extremely hard (really, really hard) to see in the normally somewhat dim lighting of a TV room. Fix? just paint the on/off button (its the middle one of three) with white nail polish or something similar. In sum - highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noise Canceling Bluetooth Wireless Over Ear Headphones
reviews.reviewText: this Noise Canceling Bluetooth Wireless Over Ear Headphones. It is very easy to use and great color products. it is very easy over the ear adjustable headphones with a built in microphone and active noise cancelling technology with comfort cushioned ear cups. It is very long battery life. Portable headphones that fold to fit in a carrying case what is not included. Its come with USB Charging Cable. Great price range and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ended being able to get this set of headphones in my favorite color. the biggest surprise turned out to be how good they have been so far for the price. I definitely have been happy with the comfort of the fit. The controls on the side took me a moment and once I got the feel it makes it a lot easier to enjoy the sound of whatever I'm connected with. Looking forward to this set of headphones having longevity and maintaining this level of performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for great sounds.
reviews.reviewText: Got this over the ears headphone due to reasonable price. As it turns out, it is lightweight and provides good sound with a nice bass. The control on the side is very useful and easy to use. Bluetooth connection is quick and easy. The volumes could've been higher, but i understand that it was limited to prevent listeners from blowing out their eardrums. The value and price is a DEAL. Overall, i would recommend this Picun headphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty ok headphones very light weight great battery life charges fairly quick. Sound is clear with good clarity the mids and highs are rather Tin-E sounding. Same model type can be found on Temu for half the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these headphones on Nov 11. Today is 12/29. I charged these headphones fully when I got them and I use them for about 4hours at a time 3 times and week. I have not had to recharge them yet! I still have 40% battery left and I use them at full volume and and very generous with using the touch control to skipand pause etc on the ear. I will say that the tradeoff for the super long lasting battery is the sound strength.The volume isn't as loud as other comparable headphones with less battery life. But because of the nice fit that seals out other noise it's not a huge issue. The sound is nice deep rich bass. Overall the sound is nice but could stand to be a little more robust. Those are minor issues for me. They are worth the price and I would definitely buy them again.PS I am a loyal Picun customer. This is my 4th pair of Picun Headphones. The very first pair I got were the P60. The pair before I purchased these are the B27. And they are both still goinf strong. The B27 still hold their charge for 80+ hours and still sound great. The only reason I got another pair is that I have worn off all of the leather like coveringon the ear pads and the headband. So I just use them for home use, I don't want to use them in public LOL
